item.title: Laureandosi
item.description: **WordPress** website which retrieves University Of Pisa graduands' grades and wraps them up in a PDF file along with some statistics and a final grade simulation

item.title: Codfish 2000
item.description: **Javascript** chess engine written from scratch, with a nice ui and a simple **PHP**-**MySQL** back-end
